title: Simon Cowell Set to Replace Howard Stern as 'America's Got Talent' Judge
text:
Comments The former 'American Idol' and 'The X-Factor' judge is now coming to 'AGT' for the upcoming eleventh season. 
Simon Cowell is back on the judge panel. This time around, he is going to judge the " America's Got Talent " hopefuls during the upcoming eleventh season. He fills in the vacant spot left by Howard Stern . "The good news is America's Got Talent is back next year and the even better news is so am I!" he wrote on Twitter. "About five or six years ago, I was offered the chance to be on the show and, at the time, I couldn't do it. But I was a bit disappointed that I wasn't able to," Cowell additionally told USA TODAY. "For the years (Howard) was on the show, he did a great job. I think at the point we really knew Howard wasn't going to come back, we then had serious conversations with NBC. I thought, 'I think this is the right time.' So, I'm excited about it." Cowell wouldn't confirm whether or not the other judges, Melanie Brown , Heidi Klum , and Howie Mandel , would be back as well. "They might decide since I've come back, they'll run for the hills," he joked. "I have no idea. I know them all. I think they've done a great job. ... I thought we'd let the dust settle and then we'll meet everyone who's on the show and then we'll make some decisions." The "AGT" is hosted by Nick Cannon . Simon previously sat on the judge panel on the other talent shows like " American Idol " and " The X-Factor ".
